subtitleNullable: News about China in German Magazine "Der Spigel"
descriptionNullable:
### Context

This data is crawled from [the website of German Magazine *Der Spiegel*](www.spiegel.de), and was first used in my own bachelor-work. I find these data will be useful for the researchers of the same interest, so I share them here in Kaggle.


### Content

There are three folders in this dataset. 

In the folder of `Chinaberichte`, all data of news about China in *Der Spiegel* has been stored here in `final.csv` and `final.xlsx` two formats. in the data file, The `Channel` is the category of each article which classified by *Der Spiegel* itself. The `Epaperkey` is the key of each e-magazine that contains the article. The `Erscheinungsdatum` the issue date of each article. The `Score` is an unknown score rated by the website of *Der Spiegel*. The `Seite` is the number of the first page on the magazine of each article. The `Text` is the full-text of each article. The `Ueberschrift` is the title of each article. The `Vorspann` is the abstract of each article. The `id` is the  unique id number of each article that stored in the database.

In the folder of `Data_Visualization` is some pictures of the data visualization from the data in the first folder.

In the folder of `spiegel` is the work directory of scrapy code for my crawling.

Finally, the `Data_Processing.ipynb` is an Ipython code file for my Data Processing.

### Acknowledgements

Thanks for my mentor Prof. Tan who gives me the inspiration and points out some great directions for me.
title: Chinaberichte in Der Spiegel (1947-2020)
